name: [DEMO] Clicker: The Adventure
description:
Created in 1 night for "Unconventional Incremental Game Jam" as a demonstration of an idea.

In this unconventional clicker, you click to carry out random battles for loot and gold, the difference being that if you aren't careful, you will die.

There are no "buildings" that play the game for you; you actually have to keep clicking to play. A mix of the clicker and RPG genres, and I quite like the idea myself.
